A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Poor editing leads to a chaotic narrative that could have been something at least good. Instead\, we have b-roll footage and an attempt at Galaxy building that ultimately makes this universe a bit smaller and unimaginitive. It's not the worst Star Wars movie\, but it most certainly is not the best. This feels\, looks\, and plays out like a big budget syfy show. Perhaps they should have presented it this way
